SELECT
FROM_UNIXTIME( ${queryField} / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as user_register_time
CASE user_role WHEN 1 THEN "专家" WHEN 2 THEN "第三方机构" WHEN 3 THEN "煤监局" WHEN 4 THEN "能源局" END as user_role
CASE user_state WHEN 1 THEN '未认证审核' WHEN 2 THEN '已认证审核' WHEN 3 THEN '解聘' END as user_state
CASE expert_info_education WHEN 1 THEN '小学' WHEN 2 THEN '初中' WHEN 3 THEN '高中' WHEN 4 THEN '大学' WHEN 5 THEN '硕士' WHEN 6 THEN '博士' WHEN 7 THEN '更多' END as expert_info_education
specialtyMap(${queryField},'expert_info_learnmajor','|') as expert_info_learnmajor
specialtyMap(${queryField},'expert_info_workmajor','|') as expert_info_workmajor
specialtyMap(${queryField},'expert_info_declaredesign_design','|') as expert_info_declaredesign_design
specialtyMap(${queryField},'expert_info_declaredesign_safety','|') as expert_info_declaredesign_safety
case ${queryField} WHEN 1 THEN '未审核' WHEN 2 THEN '拒绝' WHEN 3 THEN '通过' END as user_info_audit_state
FROM_UNIXTIME(user_info_audit_addtime/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as user_info_audit_addtime
CASE user_info_audit_type WHEN 1 THEN "初审" WHEN 2 THEN "变更审核" END as user_info_audit_type
${queryField}
FROM user_info_audit AS uia LEFT JOIN expert_info ei ON ( uia.info_id = ei.expert_info_id ) LEFT JOIN USER u ON ( u.user_id = uia.user_id_add ) WHERE user_info_audit_content=2
AND user_info_audit_state=#{user_info_audit_state}
AND user_info_audit_type=#{user_info_audit_type}
